Obtaining 3rd Party Software [PREVIOUS] [TOP] [NEXT]

7.3 Obtaining 3rd Party Software

  • Motif creates the VICAR windowing environment. Motif comes with the Solaris, SGI-IRIX and the OpenVMS operating systems, but not with the SunOS system.
  • Multinet is TCP/IP networking software for VMS machines.
  • Kerberos is used for authentication. Kerberos comes with Multinet for the Alpha. UNIX users often get. Kerberos as part of the Solaris operating system or can obtain it from Cygnus. Foreign sites must acquire Kerberos (TBD). There are specific instructions for configuring Keberos to use with MIPS software
  • XRT, XRT-3d, XRT-graph and XRT-table are widgets for Motif used in VICAR.
  • Sybase is MIPS' database software, which uses SQL as a query language.
  • RogueWave is a C++ library needed to compile, link and develop some VICAR software.
